message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for $1600000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $1600000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. How about we meet at $1400000? It's a fair compromise and still a great deal for you.

I'm still interested in the product, but $1400000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $1200000, which is the same price I offered earlier. I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you accept this price?

I understand you're firm on $1200000, but I'm still not convinced I'm getting the best deal. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'll go a bit higher than that. How about $1350000? It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's worth it.
